Name: Modern Muses
Comment: Right now its an infinite subscription please add an option to limit the number of months/payments. It will open a lot of opportunities to split a full payment into smaller chunks.

Name: Peter Vari
Comment: Yes please! With or without Stripe it would be amazing if Webflow could allow for partial payments.

Name: Youssef Jemmoua
Comment: This would certainly be the icing on the cake taking the use cases for webflow in all kind of directions and a major USP.

Name: Adrian Roach
Comment: I agree with this as this is part of my business model. So I have to track statistics and manually send payouts.
